canonical_answers.a: We serve by appointment only. I can text you the booking link—would you like that?
Interlock maintenance is $95 for 2–3 turns, or $125 for 4–6 turns. A consult deposit goes toward your service if booked within 14 days.
We’re at U Natural Hair in Southfield, MI. Parking is in the rear lot; enter Suite 9.
